page.title: 12HOME LIFE (CONT)
page.content: CHILD OF 1985 (Cont,d) OR DOMESDAY PROJECT.WE DO THIS UNTIL 12.00.THEN WE GO OUT TO PLAY AGAIN.WE PLAY UNTIL ABOUT 12.30.THEN WE GO IN FOR OUR DINNER.THERE IS A DINNER SITTING BEFORE US FOR INFANTS AND THE TOP CLASS.WE DO NOT HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS.AFTER DINNER WE GO OUT TO PLAY AGAIN.AT 1.20 WE COME BACK INTO THE CLASSROOM.NOW WE DO WHAT WE DID BEFORE PLAY UNTIL 2.20.THEN WE GO TO PLAY AGAIN.WHEN WE COME BACK IN FROM PLAY WE DON'T KNOW WHAT WE DO.SOME WEEKS WE DO O.E. AND SOMETIMES PRIMARY ENGLISH. AT 3.40 IT IS HOME TIME.WE SAY OUR PRAYER,GET OUR BAGS AND OUR COATS.THEN SIR SAYS GOODNIGHT EVERYONE WE GO OUT. I GO UP THE PATH INTO THE PLAYGROUND.MY MUM IS ALWAYS LATE.WHEN SHE COMES I GET IN THE CAR AND GO HOME.WHEN I GET HOME I GO IN THE HOUSE AND INTO THE LIVINGROOM.I GET MY MUSIC
